data.eml:eml: A colorful new species of insular rock gecko (Cnemaspis Strauch 1887) from southern Vietnam

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Grismer, Lee, Tri, Ngo Van, Grismer, Jesse L. (2010): A colorful new species of insular rock gecko (Cnemaspis Strauch 1887) from southern Vietnam. Zootaxa 2352: 46-58, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.275617
